title: "Week 5: Accuracy evaluation"
---

::: {.cell}

## What you will learn this week

* Fitted values, residuals
* Distributional forecasts
* Forecast evaluation

## Pre-class activities

Read [Chapter 5 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox.html), Sections 5.3 -- 5.5, and 5.8 -- 5.10, and watch all embedded videos

## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial)

Complete Exercises 8-10, 12 from [Section 5.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox-exercises.html).
